category.name: Coffee and Tea
category.description: The best coffee and tea in the world. Our coffees and teas will be the best you have ever put in your mouth: we even have stylish cups and mugs so you can drink in style.

category.name: Coffee
category.description: Organic slow roasted coffee with low acid content, we only use fair trade coffee. Try the best locally sourced coffee!

category.name: Tea
category.description: Our tea leaves are picked at the height of the growing season, to maximize freshness!

category.name: Gifts
category.description: Shopping for a gift? We have several nice gifts for any occasion.

category.name: Office
category.description: Like having stylish accessories in your office? Try one of our coffee mugs or picture frames.
